law.catch_line: A tribunal of this State may enforce a child support order of another state registered for purposes ...
law.text: A tribunal of this State may enforce a child support order of another state registered for purposes of modification, in the same manner as if the order had been issued by a tribunal of this State, but the registered order may be modified only if the requirements of § 10-350, § 10-352, or § 10-353.1 of this subtitle have been met.
